Sentencas: The combination of a sodium-nickel chloride (ZEBRA) battery and intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (IT-SOFC) to form a hybrid power system intended for automotive applications is examined with the aid of a fuel cell system model.
Titulo: System modelling and integration of an intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell and ZEBRA battery for automotive applications

Sentencas: The model allows the operating temperatures of the system to be assessed with a view to thermal integration with the battery.
Titulo: System modelling and integration of an intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell and ZEBRA battery for automotive applications

Sentencas: Efficiency curves for stacks and systems are described along with the temperature distribution around the system.
Titulo: System modelling and integration of an intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell and ZEBRA battery for automotive applications

Sentencas: Two types of IT-SOFC are compared, one operating in the 500-650 degrees C temperature region and one in the 700-850 degrees C region.
Titulo: System modelling and integration of an intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell and ZEBRA battery for automotive applications

Sentencas: The lower temperature IT-SOFC using external steam reforming, and the higher temperature system using partial internal steam reforming, both of methane fuel.
Titulo: System modelling and integration of an intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell and ZEBRA battery for automotive applications
System modelling and integration of an intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell and ZEBRA battery for automotive applications
